name: Apple Vision Pro 1TB Storage Spatial Computer VR Headset
shortDescription: An Immersive Way to Experience Entertainment. Interaction Designed for Spatial ComputinInnovation You Can See, Hear, and Feel,More pixels than a 4K TV for each eye
longDescription: The Apple Vision Pro is a new spatial computer that allows users to seamlessly merge digital material with the actual world while being present and socially engaged. Vision Pro provides a completely three-dimensional user interface that can be controlled by the user&aposs hands, eyes, and voice—the most instinctive and natural inputs possible. This provides programs with an unlimited canvas that outperforms the capabilities of a standard display. Vision Pro, the first spatial operating system in history, allows users to interact with digital information as if it were physically present in their environment. The groundbreaking Vision Pro design incorporates bespoke Apple silicon in a novel dual-chip architecture, an ultra-high-resolution display system with 23 million pixels across two panels, 1TB internal storage, and other technologies that ensure every experience appears to be happening in front of the user&aposs eyes in real time. The Apple Vision Pro VR Headset transforms the way people connect with their favorite apps, create and relive memories, watch fantastic TV shows and movies, and FaceTime with friends and family. It provides personal computers additional capabilities.

name: Monarch Mystery Mini Box X5 RGB Gaming Case White
shortDescription: Tempered Glass Panel: Front Glass, Left Glass
longDescription: The Monarch Mystery Mini Box X5 RGB Gaming Case White is a compact and stylish chassis designed for gaming enthusiasts and system builders who prioritize both aesthetics and performance. This case is compatible with Micro-ATX and ITX motherboards, providing flexibility for small to mid-sized builds. It features tempered glass panels on the left and front sides, allowing for a clear view of your system&aposs components and showcasing vibrant RGB lighting and neat cable management. This case offers ample storage options with a design that accommodates one HDD and three SSDs. The five PCI slots allow for multiple expansion cards, such as GPUs or additional network cards, ensuring your build can be as versatile as needed. The I/O panel is conveniently located and includes one USB 1.0 port, one USB 3.0 port, and audio jacks for easy access to essential connectivity options. Cooling is a key feature of this case, with support for a 240mm water-cooling radiator on the top and multiple fan mounting options. The case can support two 120mm fans on the top and bottom, two 120mm fans in the motherboard area, and one 120mm fan at the rear, ensuring that your components remain cool under load. It also accommodates graphics cards up to 330mm in length and CPU coolers up to 160mm in height, providing ample space for high-performance hardware. The case comes with a mystery box mini that includes five RGB fans, which not only add a vibrant touch to your build but also ensure optimal airflow and cooling. The Monarch Mystery Mini Box X5 White case is a perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics. It is an excellent choice for gamers and DIY enthusiasts looking to build a high-performance, visually appealing PC in a compact form factor.
